description.text: Create a Light Wall Token (a 1 Health Enchantment Artefact, with ‘Creatures cannot enter this Artefacts tile, unless they are allied to the player that created this token.’). It can be created in contested Ranks.
When you play this spell, you may spend an additional 1M up to 4 times. For every additional mana you spend, create an additional Artefact token in the same Rank.
